name: Vercel
tagline: Develop. Preview. Ship. For the best frontend teams.
description: A cloud platform for static sites and Serverless Functions that fits perfectly with your existing workflow.

name: Stripe
tagline: Payments infrastructure for the internet.
description: Stripe is a suite of payment APIs that powers commerce for online businesses of all sizes.

name: ConvertKit
tagline: Creator Marketing Platform
description: An email marketing tool for bloggers and creators that helps you grow your audience and sell digital products.

name: Railway
tagline: Ship now. Scale later.
description: A cloud platform that lets you deploy your apps with a simple `git push`. No DevOps required.

name: Resend
tagline: Email API for developers
description: A modern, developer-first email API that makes it easy to send transactional emails.

name: Netlify
tagline: Build, deploy, and scale modern web projects.
description: Netlify is a platform for automating modern web projects, providing continuous deployment, serverless functions, and more.

name: Paddle
tagline: The complete commerce platform for SaaS.
description: Paddle is a revenue delivery platform for SaaS that provides payments, subscription management, and automated tax compliance.

name: Mailchimp
tagline: Build your brand and sell more stuff.
description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform that helps you manage and talk to your clients, customers, and other interested parties.

name: Supabase
tagline: The open source Firebase alternative.
description: A PostgreSQL database combined with authentication, real-time subscriptions, and storage APIs.

name: Render
tagline: The easiest way to host all your web apps.
description: A unified cloud to build and run all your apps and websites with autoscaling, global CDN, and zero-downtime deploys.

name: Fathom Analytics
tagline: Simple, fast, and privacy-focused website analytics.
description: Provides actionable data without invading visitor privacy. No cookies needed, so no annoying banners.

name: Tinybird
tagline: The real-time data platform for developers.
description: A real-time data platform used to ingest data from anywhere and publish APIs to power your apps.

name: Lemon Squeezy
tagline: The all-in-one platform for selling digital products.
description: Handles global taxes, compliance, and payments so you can focus on building and selling.

name: Postmark
tagline: Email delivery for the fastest transactional emails.
description: Reliable email service for sending application emails like password resets, welcome emails, and notifications.

name: DigitalOcean
tagline: Cloud computing for developers.
description: Simple, reliable cloud hosting with virtual servers (Droplets), managed databases, and app platform services.

name: Plausible Analytics
tagline: Simple and privacy-friendly web analytics.
description: An open-source, lightweight analytics tool that gives you key insights without compromising user privacy.

name: TinyMCE
tagline: The rich text editor for the modern web.
description: A robust, highly flexible WYSIWYG editor that allows users to write and format content directly in your application.

name: Ahrefs
tagline: SEO Tools & Resources To Grow Your Search Traffic.
description: A comprehensive SEO toolkit for keyword research, site audit, backlink analysis, and competitive analysis.

name: Pipedream
tagline: The fastest way to connect APIs and build workflows.
description: A serverless integration platform for developers to build and run event-driven workflows, connecting thousands of apps.

name: Gumroad
tagline: Sell anything creative.
description: A simple e-commerce platform that allows creators to sell digital products, memberships, and courses directly to their audience.

name: Drift
tagline: Conversational Marketing Platform.
description: A platform combining chat, email, and video to help you connect with website visitors and qualify leads in real-time.

name: PostgreSQL (Self-Hosted)
tagline: The world's most advanced open source relational database.
description: A powerful, open-source object-relational database system known for reliability, data integrity, and feature robustness.

name: Firebase
tagline: Google's mobile and web application development platform.
description: A comprehensive app development platform providing real-time database, authentication, hosting, storage, and cloud functions.

name: Postman
tagline: The collaboration platform for API development.
description: A popular platform for building, testing, and documenting APIs, simplifying every stage of the API lifecycle.
